question: Create a basic APPML model with a 'Person' entity having 'name' and 'age' attributes.
Define a relationship in APPML between 'Person' and 'Address' entities.
Create an enumeration in APPML for 'Gender' with values 'Male', 'Female', and 'Other'.
Write an APPML model for a 'Book' entity with 'title', 'author', and 'publishedYear' attributes.
Create an inheritance hierarchy in APPML for 'Shape', 'Circle', and 'Rectangle' entities.
Define a many-to-many relationship in APPML between 'Student' and 'Course' entities.
Write an APPML model for a 'Product' entity with 'name', 'price', and 'description' attributes.
Create a model in APPML for a 'Company' entity with 'name', 'location', and 'employees' attributes.
Define an APPML model for 'Order' entity with 'orderId', 'orderDate', and 'totalAmount' attributes.
Write an APPML model for 'Student' entity with 'name', 'dateOfBirth', and 'major' attributes.
Create a model in APPML for 'Employee' entity with 'name', 'position', and 'salary' attributes.
Define an enumeration in APPML for 'Status' with values 'Active', 'Inactive', and 'Pending'.
Write an APPML model for 'Project' entity with 'name', 'startDate', and 'endDate' attributes.
Create an APPML model for 'Customer' entity with 'name', 'email', and 'phone' attributes.
Define a one-to-many relationship in APPML between 'Department' and 'Employee' entities.
Write an APPML model for 'Event' entity with 'eventName', 'date', and 'location' attributes.
Create an inheritance hierarchy in APPML for 'Animal', 'Dog', and 'Cat' entities.
Define an enumeration in APPML for 'Role' with values 'Admin', 'User', and 'Guest'.
Write an APPML model for 'Message' entity with 'sender', 'receiver', and 'content' attributes.
Create a model in APPML for 'Review' entity with 'productId', 'rating', and 'comment' attributes.
